holidays.description: By raising awareness, let us all work together to reduce food loss and waste!

holidays.description: Warm up the oven, sharpen your knives and get ready to carve some succulent goose meat.

holidays.title: Michaelmas

holidays.title: Mid-Autumn Festival

holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the glorious moon!

holidays.title: National Carson Day
holidays.description: Despite its ancient origins, Carson is a name that stands the test of time.

holidays.title: National Silent Movie Day
holidays.description: Be ready to watch as many silent movies as possible on this special day!

holidays.description: The adorable koalas need your help!
